## ICommandLineIntegerDefinition interface

For use with [CommandLineParameterProvider.defineIntegerParameter()](./ts-command-line.commandlineparameterprovider.defineintegerparameter.md) , this interface defines a command line parameter whose argument is an integer value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ICommandLineIntegerDefinition extends IBaseCommandLineDefinitionWithArgument
```

<b>Extends:</b> [IBaseCommandLineDefinitionWithArgument](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinitionwithargument.md)

## Properties

| Property                                                                                      | Modifiers | Type                                     | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [argumentName](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinitionwithargument.argumentname.md)      |           | string                                   | <p>The name of the argument, which will be shown in the command-line help.</p><p>(Inherited from [IBaseCommandLineDefinitionWithArgument](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinitionwithargument.md) )</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [completions?](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinitionwithargument.completions.md)       |           | () =&gt; Promise&lt;string\[\]&gt;       | <p><i>(Optional)</i> An optional callback that provides a list of custom choices for tab completion.</p><p>(Inherited from [IBaseCommandLineDefinitionWithArgument](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinitionwithargument.md) )</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [defaultValue?](./ts-command-line.icommandlineintegerdefinition.defaultvalue.md)              |           | number                                   | <i>(Optional)</i> The default value which will be used if the parameter is omitted from the command line.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [description](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinition.description.md)                    |           | string                                   | <p>Documentation for the parameter that will be shown when invoking the tool with "--help"</p><p>(Inherited from [IBaseCommandLineDefinition](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinition.md) )</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [environmentVariable?](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinition.environmentvariable.md)   |           | string                                   | <p><i>(Optional)</i> The name of an environment variable that the parameter value will be read from, if it was omitted from the command-line. An error will be reported if the environment value cannot be parsed.</p><p>(Inherited from [IBaseCommandLineDefinition](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinition.md) )</p>                                                                                                                               |
| [parameterGroup?](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinition.parametergroup.md)             |           | string \| typeof SCOPING_PARAMETER_GROUP | <p><i>(Optional)</i> An optional parameter group name, shown when invoking the tool with "--help"</p><p>(Inherited from [IBaseCommandLineDefinition](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinition.md) )</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [parameterLongName](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinition.parameterlongname.md)        |           | string                                   | <p>The long name of the flag including double dashes, e.g. "--do-something"</p><p>(Inherited from [IBaseCommandLineDefinition](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinition.md) )</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [parameterScope?](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinition.parameterscope.md)             |           | string                                   | <p><i>(Optional)</i> An optional parameter scope name, used to add a scope-prefixed parameter synonym, e.g. "--scope:do-something". Scopes provide additional flexibility for parameters in conflict resolution since when a scope is specified, parameters that have conflicting long names will be defined using only the scope-prefixed name.</p><p>(Inherited from [IBaseCommandLineDefinition](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinition.md) )</p> |
| [parameterShortName?](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinition.parametershortname.md)     |           | string                                   | <p><i>(Optional)</i> An optional short name for the flag including the dash, e.g. "-d"</p><p>(Inherited from [IBaseCommandLineDefinition](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinition.md) )</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [required?](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinition.required.md)                         |           | boolean                                  | <p><i>(Optional)</i> If true, then an error occurs if the parameter was not included on the command-line.</p><p>(Inherited from [IBaseCommandLineDefinition](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinition.md) )</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [undocumentedSynonyms?](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinition.undocumentedsynonyms.md) |           | string\[\]                               | <p><i>(Optional)</i> Specifies additional names for this parameter that are accepted but not displayed in the command line help.</p><p>(Inherited from [IBaseCommandLineDefinition](./ts-command-line.ibasecommandlinedefinition.md) )</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
